short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you make annotations for any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Note: If you see any error, or note not loads, please logout and login again. I am actively developing it, which make it not that stable now.

An extension that works for page annotation!

1. Select any page text, and annotate it with pre-picked highlight color
2. Right sidebar to view your notes for current page
3. Option page as a dashboard for all your notes
4. Enable popover search with right click for your notes
5. Enable tags support

Note: It will be very helpful for knowledge management. While it is better not to store any of your sensitive information.
